Uses of Class
irtrusbot.IrcBot

    • Uses of IrcBot in irtrusbot

      Fields in irtrusbot declared as IrcBot 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      IrcBot IrcPlugin.bot
      The bot object the plugin is attached to - Provides control over specific bot operations to the plugin.
      Methods in irtrusbot with parameters of type IrcBot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void IrcPlugin.initialize(IrcSession sess, IrcBot b, IrcPluginManager disp)
      Method used by the Plugin Manager to set instance fields in the plugin [to provide control to the plugin] during loading.
      Constructors in irtrusbot with parameters of type IrcBot 
      Constructor and Description
      IrcPluginManager(IrcBot b)
      Construct the class and include an instance of the Bot constructing it
